title: Fitness leader exercise encyclopaedia
creator_credit: Bill Edmonds and Australian Council for Health, Physical Education and Recreation
brief_description: Designed for trainers, coaches, physical educators and other fitness leaders. Shows over one hundred exercises and sequences and explanations of correct and incorrect techniques. All exercises and sequences are numbered for quick and easy references and grouped for major muscle groups.
